Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. Given its high-quality features and the time and resources invested into its development, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its unique benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $200 for you today. This opportunity is exclusive and won't be available after this offer expires. Don't miss out on enhancing your experience with our top-tier product! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
